column2: ENGLISH
Proselytize in [offmap_china.GetShortName] China
Ask [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetDynName] for permission to send [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s into the Middle Kingdom.
Stop proselytizing in the [offmap_china.GetName]
Supporting the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s isn't worth it anymore. We need to call them back.
Aiding the spread of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith
Greatly aiding the spread of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith
Sightly hindering the spread of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith
Greatly hindering the spread of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith
This option is available because you are of §Yexcellent breeding§!
By working themselves to the bone your [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s are sure to win converts, but the resulting exhaustion may have negative effects...
This option is available because you are §Yrenowned§! for your faith in §Y[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]§!
This option is available because you are willing to do §Yanything§!- even lie- in service to §Y[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]§!
Your [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] relays tactical advice from the commander
Your [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]'s [KCCGetPilgrimCulture] friend joins you at court
Proselytizing in [offmap_china.GetShortName] China
This character is sending [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s to preach in [offmap_china.GetShortName] China, and has the support of the Emperor
Proselytizing in [offmap_china.GetShortName] China
This character is sending [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s to preach in [offmap_china.GetShortName] China against the wishes of the Emperor
[offmap_china.GetShortName] Trade Contacts
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has forged close ties with merchants from the Middle Kingdom, and is reaping the rewards
Insulted [offmap_china.GetShortName] Merchants
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] is finding it harder to trade in the [offmap_china.GetName] after offending a prominent [offmap_china.Ruler.Culture.GetName] merchant
Workers of the World, Unite!
The emperor was quite impressed by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s devotion to Mazdak's ideals
Workers of the World, Unite!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s devotion to Mazdak's ideals has strained relations with the [offmap_china.GetName]
Workers of the World, Unite!
The [offmap_china.GetShortName] Emperor is furious at [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s actions taken in Mazdak's name
Crafty [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitleCap]s
Your [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s' clever wordplay has inspired you to focus more on intrigue
Sincere [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitleCap]s
Your [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s' integrity reflects well on you, their sponsor
[KCCGetPilgrimCulture] Advisor
A pilgrim from the far east has joined [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s court and now lurks in the background, providing [Root.GetHerHim] with advice
[KCCGetPilgrimCulture] Advisor
A pilgrim from the far east has joined [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s court and now lurks in the background, providing [Root.GetHerHim] with advice
[KCCGetPilgrimCulture] Advisor
A pilgrim from the far east has joined [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s court and now lurks in the background, providing [Root.GetHerHim] with advice
[KCCGetPilgrimCulture] Advisor
A pilgrim from the far east has joined [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s court and now lurks in the background, providing [Root.GetHerHim] with advice
Japanese
Korean
Kinh
Orang Melayu
Nippon
Choson
Dai Viet
Malaya
My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s won some converts to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
Joyous news, my expert [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s won many converts to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith!
Curses! My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s turned some [offmap_china.GetShortName] away from the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
Woe is me! My incompetent [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s scared off many potential [offmap_china.GetShortName] converts.
It seems my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s failed to make any real impact on the [offmap_china.GetShortName].
The [KCCGetPilgrimCulture] Pilgrim my lead [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] befriended has made it to my court with the letter.
The letter is here, but my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]'s [KCCGetPilgrimCulture] friend is nowhere to be seen...

[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] Imperial Majesty, [offmap_china.Ruler.GetBestName], has decided to welcome the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s of [Root.GetDynName] into the middle kingdom. You of course understand what a privilege this is and will instruct your [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s to be on their best behavior.
Onwards to China!.

[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] Imperial Majesty, [offmap_china.Ruler.GetBestName], will never allow you to pollute the souls of the middle kingdom with your heathenous trash. Your [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s will not be welcomed, and you can be sure that if you proceed regardless, we shall be opposing their efforts with every appropriate measure.

[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] Imperial Majesty, [offmap_china.Ruler.GetBestName], has decided that they will not be welcoming your [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s into the middle kingdom. You of course understand that [Root.Religion.GetName] is a destabilizing influence, and we do not wish it to spread within our borders.
You can't stop me from sending as many [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s into China as I like!
I understand and will respect [offmap_china.Ruler.GetBestName]'s wishes.

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. They passed through a small peasant village that has had a particularly bad harvest. The locals were starving, and a particularly young [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] with the expedition demanded they do something about it. The lead [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] gave it some thought, and decided to...
Distribute their food in the hopes that the display of generosity will win converts.
Demand the locals convert, using the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]'s food as 'encouragement'.
Pray to [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] for the peasants and move on.
Share some of the extra food I packed with the local [offmap_china.GetShortName]s.

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. While travelling a well-worn path between two cities, they were ambushed by a troupe of bandits. The bandit leader demanded tribute in exchange for the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s' safe passage. Thankfully, the leader of the expedition is a level-headed [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle], and they immediately...
Complied with the bandits' demands. My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s need additional supplies.
Used all their rhetorical skill to convert the bandits to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
Told the bandits of the horrors I inflicts on my enemies...

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. They were leaving an administrative office when they found their path blocked by a Confucian scholar. The man observed my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s briefly before challenging them to a debate on the merits of their faith & how it could impact [offmap_china.GetShortName] society. The scholar looked confident. My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s agreed to the debate, and their primary argument was...

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. They were leaving an administrative office when they found their path blocked by a Confucian scholar. The man dully observed my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s briefly before challenging them to a debate on the merits of their faith & how it could impact [offmap_china.Ruler.Culture.GetName] society. The scholar looked inept. My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s agreed to the debate, and their primary argument was...

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. They were leaving an administrative office when they found their path blocked by a Confucian scholar. The man observed my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s briefly before challenging them to a debate on the merits of their faith & how it could impact [offmap_china.Ruler.Culture.GetName] society. My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s agreed to the debate, and their primary argument was...
The values of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, and how they'd benefit [offmap_china.GetShortName] society.
The administrative principles that naturally flow from [Root.Religion.GetName] values.
The filial piety that is so common to [Root.Religion.GetName]s, using me as an example.
A delaying tactic. They then conceded defeat as gracefully as they could.

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. They were discussing some of the miracles attested to in [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], when one of the craftier [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s suggested making their own miracles happen. Surely a little lie could be forgiven if it leads the [offmap_china.Ruler.Culture.GetName] people to into [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]'s arms?
They impressed the [offmap_china.GetShortName] with their [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]-granted breath of fire!
They showed [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]'s power by communing with beasts!
They healed the sick with pure faith in [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s berated their unworthy companion for their impiety.

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. In their travels they'd come across a group of peasants working to erect some small cottages- apparently, a recent fire destroyed the homes of some [offmap_china.GetShortName] smallfolk. A particularly empathetic & diligent [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] suggested that the party could lead by example, and win converts through good works. My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s...
Went ahead & helped the peasants.
Showed them the diligence [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] bestows on their followers.
Constructed a statue of the most holy [Root.Religion.GetName] ever to rule- me.

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. While preaching in the square of a small town, a [offmap_china.GetShortName] woman stormed into the square and demanded to know how they could extoll the virtues of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] when evil still existed in the world. Her young son was dead, and if [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] could not help him, why should anyone believe [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] could?
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] works in mysterious ways. I'm sure this is for the best.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] isn't the only actor- [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] is the root of evil.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is always in need of valiant servants- obviously your son was chosen!
My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s were unable to give an answer and beat a hasty retreat.

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. During a discussion, the point was raised that there are but few [offmap_china.GetShortName]s who can comprehend the holy tongue, and this is hampering our efforts to spread the good word of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] in the east. Perhaps translating the [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] into the [offmap_china.GetShortName] language would be a good next step in their efforts? The head [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] looked at their underling and responded...
That is an excellent idea! We should begin working on a translation immediately.

No, [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] is meant to be experienced personally, not from stuffy tomes.;FRENCH;GERMAN;;SPANISH;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT_kccmission.0010c;We're {Root.Culture.GetName], we already have translations. Are you daft?"

No, we will not profane [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] with the [offmap_china.GetShortName] tongue.;FRENCH;GERMAN;;SPANISH;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_kccmission.0011;I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. They were passing through a provincial [offmap_china.GetShortName] capital when a local governor invited them to meet. The official had heard that my holy men were spreading the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, & wanted to find out whether [Root.Religion.GetName] ideas have any merit or if they're just another inferior outside influence. Exited, my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s...;FRENCH;GERMAN;;SPANISH;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT_kccmission.0011a;Argued how [Root.Religion.GetName] principles inevitably lead to prosperity;FRENCH;GERMAN;;SPANISH;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT_kccmission.0011b;Argued that great rulers are the natural result of [Root.Religion.GetName] ideals;FRENCH;GERMAN;;SPANISH;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT_kccmission.0011c;Pointed out that ruling sometimes requires... less than honorable actions;FRENCH;GERMAN;;SPANISH;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT_kccmission.0011d;Declined the invitation with as much dignity as they could and left the city;FRENCH;GERMAN;;SPANISH;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_kccmission.0012;I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. They were approached by the servant of a merchant lord who wished to meet with the preachers. The trader had been increasingly dealing with [Root.Religion.GetName]s and was considering converting to improve relations. Once they heard that [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s were in the city, they simply had to meet...;FRENCH;GERMAN;;SPANISH;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPT_kccmission.0012aa;There is no conflict between wealth & [Root.Religion.GetName] principles."
My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s mislead the bourgeois, for the sake of furthering Mazdak's noble goals.
My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s sternly rebuked the aspiring aristocrat of the folly of their greed.
My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s launched into a tirade against the disgusting avarice of the fat tyrant.
Revolutionary zeal overwhelmed my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s- they stormed the manor with the local poor.

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. While pondering the best way to spread the worship of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] among the [offmap_china.GetShortName], several remarked that they were inspired to take up the mantle of [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] by displays of intense devotion- perhaps a similar display would work here?  At the very least, it couldn't hurt, right?
The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s fasted for a month to show their devotion to [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap].
The more pious among the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s whipped themselves to cleanse their sins.
The most zealous [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s were overwhelmed by faith & immolated themselves!

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. They had been preaching in a [offmap_china.GetShortName] city when a freak storm destroyed a nearby village. The [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetName] [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s have blamed the storm on my pious [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s! They say that [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] is displeased with the [offmap_china.GetShortName] for allowing foreign preachers to spread their ideas. What's worse, the townsfolk seem to be taking this claim seriously!
The [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s couldn't prove a thing. My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s complained to the governor.
Words are wind- only action could prove the righteousness of the [Root.Religion.GetName] way.
My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s were crafty- sly rumors turned the tables on the [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s.

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. They were passing through a town when the Imperial Examinations were about to begin. If one of the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s could get a position in the [offmap_china.GetShortName] bureaucracy, they could work to further the spread of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith from within the [offmap_china.GetName]. They were able to scrape together enough funds for the test, and they...
Treated the test with all the respect it deserved.
Cheated, of course. Such an opportunity is too great to leave to 'skill'.
I handpicked my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s for their skill- they passed.
Decided that the [offmap_china.GetShortName] test wasn't with taking.

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. They were preaching in a tavern- to 'Get at the heart of the local culture,' the letter says- when some [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetName] [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s entered the building. The letter assures me that these [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s were drunken sots- not like my pious [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s. One thing led to another, and the impromptu debate the groups were having took a much more... aggressive turn.

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. They were preaching in a town square when a group of drunken [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetName] [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s staggered out of a tavern. The barely coherent [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s engaged my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in an impromptu debate on the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith & how it is surely antithetical to all of [offmap_china.GetShortName] society. Owing to their sobriety, my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s easily won the debate. It seems the [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s didn't take this well.
Good thing my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s know how to take a punch.
Good thing my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s know to aim below the belt.
Good thing my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s thought to hire bodyguards.
They were sober enough to consider optics. Their pacifism won converts.
They thought to consider optics. Their pacifism won converts.

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. One of their number had seemed oddly irritable lately. When they came across some [offmap_china.GetShortName] peasants performing a [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetName] ritual, the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] snapped, & launched into a very loud, public condemnation of their 'sinful, heathenous ways.' Anger visible on the peasants' faces, the expedition leader stepped in &...
Assured them that the 'insults' were actually fair critiques lost in translation.
Accused the offending [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] of being planted by [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetName] [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s.
Tried to diffuse the situation by disputing the definition of the word 'sinful.'
Praised their compatriot's honesty & denounced the locals' primitive religion.

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. While they were seting up camp in the countryside, they were stumbled on by a patrolling garrison. The officer offered to escort them to the nearest town, where they'd be safe. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s had ample opportunity to mingle with the soldiers during the trek & attempted to spread the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith by...
Praising the soldiers' bravery & sharing tales of [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] heroes in [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].
Extolling the virtues of mercy, for [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] rewards the peaceful.
Claiming that [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] would surely grant them invincibility if they converted.
Multiple methods, leaving the soldiers more confused than impressed.

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. They had spent a few days preaching in a village near a garrison, and the officer in charge of the fort had heard of them & wished to meet with these strange & exotic outsiders. The lead [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s met with the commander for a private meal, where they attempted to convert the officer by...
Outlining how [Root.Religion.GetName] values naturally lent themselves to command.
Faking a vision of the officer as a holy warrior, fighting for [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].
Discussing the campaigns the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] has been on, for the expedition leader was an experienced commander.
Actually, they declined the invitation.

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. They were passing through a town near the [offmap_china.GetName]'s coast when a group of traditionalist scholars intercepted them.  These learned men demanded to know how these foreigners could dare to spread their impure, alien ideas within the [offmap_china.GetName]'s borders. The lead [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] responded...
The [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is but a natural extension of your own
Your primitive religion isn't worthy of being called such!

I received a letter from my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the middle kingdom today. They had encountered a traveler from the faraway land of [KCCGetPilgrimHomeland] on the road between two [offmap_china.GetName] towns. The traveler quickly struck up a friendship with the lead [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle], and after a few days the expedition leader...
Converted their friend & charged them with spreading [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]'s word.
Urged them to make their way to my court, certain that I would welcome them.
Had a tearful goodbye & finally parted ways.

At last! The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s I sent into the [offmap_china.GetName] have returned! They experienced many weird & wonderful adventures in their quest to spread the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith and bring the middle kingdom into [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]'s embrace, and their efforts have borne fruit- communities of [Root.Religion.GetName]s have sprung up where none existed before, and the [offmap_china.Ruler.Culture.GetName] are that much closer to the truth!

Woe is me! My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s have returned from the [offmap_china.GetName] with disheartening news! Despite their best efforts, they have not managed to win many converts to the [Root.Religion.GetName] way, and what little successes they did find are even now slipping back into their [offmap_china.Ruler.Religion.GetName] ways. We have failed [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].
We have planted a sturdy [Root.Religion.GetName] seed. For [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
The [Root.Religion.GetName] community in the [offmap_china.GetName] is small for now but given time it will surely blossom.
Is this my fault, or is it the work of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]?

[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] Imperial Majesty, [offmap_china.Ruler.GetBestName], had previously granted your predecessor the right to preach the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in our borders. [offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHe] is prepared to grant you the same right, so long as your [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s continue to respect our laws.

[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] Imperial Majesty, [offmap_china.Ruler.GetBestName], had previously denied your predecessor the right to preach the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in our borders- but the villain refused & proved the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] an enemy of the [offmap_china.GetName]. Now is your chance to repair relations- choose wisely...
I will carry on my predecessor's noble work.
This isn't worth the trouble it will cause.
I will not pollute the souls of the [offmap_china.GetName] with my predecessor's false religion.

At last! The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s my predecessor sent into the [offmap_china.GetName] have returned! They experienced many weird & wonderful adventures in their quest to spread the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith and bring the middle kingdom into [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]'s embrace, and their efforts have borne fruit- communities of [Root.Religion.GetName]s have sprung up where none existed before, and the [offmap_china.Ruler.Culture.GetName] are that much closer to the truth!
Now that I no longer follow the [From.GetName] faith, there is no need for me to continue supporting the [From.GetPriestTitle]s I have sent into the [offmap_china.GetName].

Unfortunately, now that I must practice the [Root.SecretReligion.GetName] faith in secret, I shall need to recall the [Root.SecretReligion.GetPriestTitle]s I have sent into the [offmap_china.GetName].
Perhaps I can send some [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in their place...
Wouldn't want to blow my cover now, would I?
I should focus on spreading the [Root.SecretReligion.GetName] faith at home before looking to the Middle Kingdom.
Unfortunately, I can no longer continue supporting the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s I have sent into the [offmap_china.GetName], as they are too far away.
Unfortunately, my recent loss in status means that I can no longer continue supporting the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s I have sent into the [offmap_china.GetName].
Curses!

My predecessor [portrait_target.GetTitledName] had been supporting a group of preaching [portrait_target.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in [offmap_china.GetShortName] China before [portrait_target.GetHerHis] death. I of course have no intention of supporting the efforts of those heathens & will be cutting all funding & diplomatic support immediately.
I hope [portrait_target.GetFirstName] is rolling in [portrait_target.GetHerHis] grave.
